description: OH EM GEEE! I want to go to California so bad! It looks like you had a great time!
I used to live in LA. Cool place.
How was Spain? I love the architecture there, it looks so cool in the photos!
Ireland is so beautiful. Loved the pics.
I love going to DC but hate the traffic.
I love Nats park, too bad the team stinks :(.
My sister got arrested in Mexico lol. Needless to say she doesn't like to tlak about it.
I stayed at the same resort, I had such a good time.
Dubai looks so cool, just a little out of my price range for now.
The Burj Khlalifa is incredible. Some great restaurants around there too.
